mapper.update: update helper_plus_user set login_gmt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where user_id = #{userId} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into helper_plus_user_authentication values (#{userAuthenticationId}, #{userId}, null, null, null, 0, null, 0, null, null)
mapper.update:
update helper_plus_user_authentication set
user_margin = #{userMargin},
user_real_name = #{userRealName},
user_identification = #{userIdentification},
user_tel_phone = #{userTelPhone},
/*实名认证状态：1，已实名认证*/ user_authentication_status = 1, update_gmt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where user_id = #{userId} and user_authentication_id = #{userAuthenticationId} and is_deleted = 0
